wo.subject: Complete CRUD Function
wo.description: Build application out to include all CRUD functionality. Fix issue where loading #home does not console log as expected. Begin work on assignments due 2013-03-14.

wo.subject: Make it pretty
wo.description: Increase visual appeal of application. Create and implement a theme. Add images and build a true CTA.

wo.subject: Finalize cruise plans
wo.description: Balance of cruise due. Book and pay for any excursions. Gather any necessary travel documents or apply for those missing. Start planning list of items to pack

wo.subject: Apply for passports
wo.description: Have photo taken, bring drivers license, birth certificate and 2 blank checks. Make copy of both sides of drivers license using only the front side of paper. Have application pre-filled but do not sign.

wo.subject: Send Birthday invites
wo.description: For Heather's party. Finalize menu and purchase decorations. Have gift ready.

wo.subject: Pack non-essential items for cruise
wo.description: Purchase luggage if have not done so already. Pack items not used day-to-day that will be going. Fill any prescriptions and pack needed quantities. Purchase camera if necessary, extra memory cards and batteries.

wo.subject: Order cigars
wo.description: Order cigars to take on cruise. Arturo Fuente Don Carlos #2 (minimum 5), travel humidor and accessories.

wo.subject: Pack essential items for cruise
wo.description: Complete packing all items - Carry-on: 12-pack of sodas, cigars (in humidor) w/ accys, cameras, extra batteries and memory cards. Messanger case: Laptop, tablet, all chargers. Checked bags: Clothes, toiletries, power strip, fridge magnet, bungee cord, 'extra' beverages (split between both bags), closed toed shoes.
